use.flag: Add support for net-print/cupsddk which enables dynamic PPD files (recommended)
Add support for sys-apps/dbus which enables better communications with your device (recommended)
Enable fax on multifunction devices which support it
Enable GTK+ dependencies, currently only the scanner GUI with USE=scanner.
Only build internal hpijs driver (not recommended at all, make sure you know what you are doing)
Enable parallel port for devices which require it
Use precompiled PPD files (obsolete, use cupsddk instead)
Enable graphical interface using Qt 3 (recommended); when both qt3 and qt4 USE flags are enabled then qt3 is prioritary over qt4
Enable graphical interface using Qt 4 (experimental); when both qt3 and qt4 USE flags are enabled then qt3 is prioritary over qt4
Enable scanner on multifunction devices which support it
Add support for net-analyzer/net-snmp which enables this driver to work over networks (both for server and client)
